sourcesContent:
// 根组件：负责整合所有小组件 import React, { Fragment } from 'react' import { GlobalStyle } from './style' import { GlobalStaticStyle } from './statics/iconfont/iconfont' import { BrowserRouter, Route } from 'react-router-dom' import Header from './common/header' import QrCode from './common/qrcode' import Footer from './common/footer' import Home from './pages/home' import Explore from './pages/explore' import Discovery from './pages/discovery' function App () { return ( {/* 全局样式组件写在根节点内的最上面 */} {/* 路由：根据不同 url 显示不同组件 */} {/* 不变的部分如公共组件通常写在外面，用到 Link 组件的要写在里面 */}
{/* Header 组件用到了 Link */}
) } export default App
